Package realtime

Class Summary
Consts Holds constant members used by multiple classes in the package.
DatReader Reads a .dat file and parses the values contained in it.
DatStreamer This class is responsible for simulating real-time frames streaming using .dat files.
DatToPgmTranslator This class is responsible for translating a .dat frame to a .pgm file.
FrameHistorian This class is responsible for retrieving already existing frames.
PgmReader Reads a .pgm file and parses the values contained in it.
ProcessRunner This class is responsible for running a process in a safe way, including waiting for it to finish and closing its input/output/error streams.
RealtimeTriangulatorThread This class is responsible to create the triangulation and/or simplification of a terrain in real-time.
SmfToTriangles This class is responsible converting the data from a .smf file into an array to Triangle_dt objects, that represents a triangulation.
TerrainSimplifier This class is responsible for simplifying a terrain received as input.
TerrainSimplifierThread This class is responsible to run a TerrianSimplifier simplify() method in its own thread - only on a single frame.
TerrainStreamer An abstract class that represents a terrain streamer.
TerrainTriangulatorThread This class is responsible to run a TerrianSimplifier triangulate() method in its own thread - only on a single frame.
